body:
Nope, ignore me, some careful reasoning, and I can see exactly how I could have multiple go-routines writing to that same map. Hasn't shown up in testing with -race yet, but that's the joy of these concurrency bugs!

(Source isn't available, at least not for a few more weeks, and everything beneath what I posted is into my code. Anyway, closing this now as I've no doubt it's my own fault. Sorry for the noise and thanks for the help.)
